attributes.action: Hold a General Election in 2016 in light of the UK's Vote to Leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
I urge MPs of all sides to repeal the fixed term Parliment Act and dissolve Parliment early and hold a General Election before the end of 2016, to give the public a direct say in its desires for our future relationship with he EU.

The Prime Minister's replacement will have no mandate from the electorate as a whole to negotiate on it's behalf the UK's future relationship with the EU.
attributes.background:
As the UK has voted to leave the European Union and the Prime Minister has resigned. Parliment should dissolve itself at the earliest opportunity and hold a General Election.

The Prime Ministers replacement will have no mandate from the electorate to negotiate our future relationship with the EU.
